!Art/banner-github.jpg > Nordic is a Gtk3.20+ theme created using the awesome Nord color palette. Installation Extract the zip file to the themes directory i.e. or create it if necessary. To set the theme on Gnome, run the following commands in Terminal: or Change via distribution specific tweak tool. Firefox theme If you're a firefox user you should give a try to the awesome Nordic theme for firefox. !Art/firefox-preview.jpg
